mapper.update: /* site.menu.service.MenuService.update */ UPDATE TB_OPTR_MENU_INFO SET MENU_NM = #{menuNm}, OPTR_PGM_NO = #{optrPgmNo}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, SORT_OR = #{sortOr}, UPDT_PN_NO = #{loginUserNo}, UPDT_PN_IP = #{remoteAddr}, UPDT_DTTM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') WHERE MENU_NO = #{menuNo}
mapper.select: /* site.menu.service.MenuService.getMenuInfo */ SELECT * FROM (SELECT LEVEL, Z.SORT_OR, Z.MENU_NO, Z.HGRK_MENU_NO, Z.OPTR_PGM_NO, Z.MENU_NM, Z.USE_YN, Z.OPTR_PGM_NM FROM (SELECT A.SORT_OR, A.MENU_NO, A.HGRK_MENU_NO, A.OPTR_PGM_NO, A.MENU_NM, A.USE_YN, (SELECT X.OPTR_PGM_NM FROM TB_OPTR_PGM_INFO X WHERE X.OPTR_PGM_NO = A.OPTR_PGM_NO) AS OPTR_PGM_NM FROM TB_OPTR_MENU_INFO A )Z WHERE MENU_NO = #{menuNo} START WITH Z.HGRK_MENU_NO = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR Z.MENU_NO = Z.HGRK_MENU_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY Z.SORT_OR )
